title: Electrochemical exfoliation of 2D materials beyond graphene
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,3036-3064
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00815K, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Minghao Zhao, Cinzia Casiraghi, Khaled Parvez
In the last decade the research on the electrochemical exfoliation of two-dimensional materials has advanced significantly. This review highlights the recent achievements and future challenges in this research area with focus on novel 2D materials.
